title: SASS Skills
podstawy_sass_text: SCSS and SASS syntax, file compilation, project integration.
zmienne_text: Defining and using variables to store color values, sizes, and more.
zagniezdzanie_text: Nesting selectors and rules to simplify CSS code organization.
mixiny_text: Defining and using mixins for reusable style blocks.
dziedziczenie_text: Using @extend to inherit styles between selectors.
operacje_funkcje_text: Performing mathematical operations, using built-in SASS functions.
importowanie_text: Modularizing code by importing SASS files.
interpolacja_text: Using #{} to dynamically generate selector names and properties.
zarzadzanie_bleem_text: Using @error, @warn, @debug for error and warning handling.
source_maps_text: Configuring and using source maps for debugging.
integracja_text: Using SASS with tools like Gulp, Grunt, Webpack.
